name: BOOMerang (Tanteturner, GebackeneBanane)
description:
At the start of the round you throw your BOOMerang, but when you try to catch it, it goes BOOM. 

Kill as many enemies as you can and try to get to the highest wave.

Art by: @GebackeneBanane

Programming by: @Tanteturner1

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Left-click to dash
